name: cinderhold
description:
Brave the Cinderhold, find the lost chalice to win!

WASD controls to move

SPACE to jump

Mouse 1 to shoot

Mouse 2 for GRAPPLING hook 

if you pick up a spell page, use 1 and 2 to swap between spell pages, and then 'E' to cast your enhancement

Arrows are finite and must be picked back up to be restocked. 

'R' key reloads the game!
